process_description: End-to-end inventory management for Pandora Australia and New Zealand retail operations covering store replenishment, transfers, returns, and claims processing

steps.name: Create Order - Jewelry (O&O/Franchise)
steps.description: Store creates sales order for jewelry replenishment via AU Portal

steps.name: Process Order at TDC
steps.description: Thailand Distribution Center processes jewelry order and creates packing slip

steps.name: Ship Jewelry to Store
steps.description: TDC ships jewelry order to store via courier

steps.name: Receive Jewelry at Store
steps.description: Store receives shipment and commits stock to SOH in AR Backoffice

decisions.question: Does shipment match packing slip?
options: Accept partial and create supply claim

steps.name: Create POSM Order
steps.description: Store creates sales order for Point-of-Sale Materials

steps.name: Process POSM at DHL
steps.description: DHL warehouse receives order via Manhattan WMS and creates PIK numbers

steps.name: Ship POSM to Store
steps.description: DHL picks, packs and ships POSM order

steps.name: Receive POSM at Store
steps.description: Store receives POSM shipment - PIK number on label only, no pick slip included

steps.name: Create Store-to-Store Transfer
steps.description: Store A creates transfer request to Store B in AR Backoffice

steps.name: Ship Transfer Items
steps.description: Store A ships physical items to Store B

steps.name: Receive Transfer at Destination
steps.description: Store B accepts or rejects transfer in AR - AX updated on acceptance

decisions.question: Accept or reject transfer?
options: Accept - stock added to Store B
Reject - stock NOT returned to Store A (manual adjustment needed)

steps.name: Create RMA (Return) - AU Stores
steps.description: Store creates return claim in AU Portal for jewelry returns

steps.name: Ship Returns to Sydney HQ
steps.description: Store ships return parcel to Sydney HQ via Australia Post

steps.name: Receive & Verify Returns at HQ
steps.description: Supply Chain Team receives returns, scans RMA barcode, confirms in AX

steps.name: Process Return Credit
steps.description: Supply Chain Team creates Sales Credit Order (SCO) in AX

steps.name: Commit Credit at Store
steps.description: Store accepts SCO in AR Backoffice to update SOH

steps.name: Create POSM Claim
steps.description: Store creates claim for POSM issues (VM Material, Supply, Damaged)

steps.name: Review & Resolve POSM Claim
steps.description: Supply Chain Team reviews claim and issues credit or re-ship

decisions.question: Claim resolution type?
decisions.criteria: Based on claim type and validation

steps.name: Lodge Lost in Transit Claim
steps.description: Store lodges freight delivery claim for missing shipment

steps.name: Investigate Lost Shipment
steps.description: Supply Chain Team investigates with courier

steps.name: Resolve Lost in Transit
steps.description: Process resolution based on investigation - re-ship, credit, or new invoice
outputs: Re-shipment OR Credit OR New invoice

steps.name: Back Order Cancellation (Weekly)
steps.description: Supply Chain Team cancels back orders older than 30 days to clean up open invoices

pain_points: Lead time to process credit claims causes huge inventory inaccuracies
References on parcels don't match AR (PIK numbers vs SI numbers)
In-transit stock not visible to stores
Stores cannot over/under receive - must accept all then create supply claim
Manual work across multiple systems with different references
